snippet: Technology has provided new outlets for people to celebrate, or boast about, their achievements, but that hasn’t made bragging more socially acceptable than it was before.
abstract: Alina Tugend Shortcuts column on how technology has provided new outlets for people to celebrate, or boast about, their achievements, but people should note that advances have not made bragging more socially acceptable than it was before.
lead_paragraph: Technology has provided new outlets for people to celebrate, or boast about, their achievements, but that hasn’t made bragging more socially acceptable than it was before.

headline.seo: The Etiquette of Celebrating or Bragging About Achievements
headline.main: Etiquette Lessons for the Braggart: Step 1, Don’t Pretend to Be Humble
headline.print_headline: Etiquette Lessons for the Braggart: Step 1, Don’t Pretend to Be Humble
